name: Jungle Hunter
description:
a platformer game, you play as a hunter in jungle you have 1 arrow to use for hunting jungle animals

Made in 3 days for zanga game jam

There is some bugs in the game if you face any one press R letter to restart and see game controls in the game file

controls:

WSAD = movement
M = jump/select
N = throw arrow
R = restart game
escapr = exit game

f4 = full screen
